title: Long loading times on mac
body:
I know this has been an issue since a long time but is there a solution or is there any future patches which can make this horrible long loading time into a game ! it takes like a minute or two to get into a game.
I know that there will be replies saying that my system has low specs and that I need to upgrade into a new one but i have a friend playing on a much higher specs than mine and I also saw a guy on youtube stating the same problem with decent specs as well . Riot please help! Thank you {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 
Well here are my specs just in case:
Macbook pro
Processor 2.5Ghz Intel Core I5
Memory 4Gb 1600 Mhz
Graphics Intel HD Graphics 4000 1536 MB

replies.body: Can you clarify whether the loading time is longer after entering the loading screen or if you're experiencing this between when champ select ends and where you see champion portraits and all the players in the loading screen?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ARjuA434,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-06T22:33:03.350+0000)
>
> Can you clarify whether the loading time is longer after entering the loading screen or if you're experiencing this between when champ select ends and where you see champion portraits and all the players in the loading screen?

Yes, this happens when the champ select ends and when everyone is in the loading screen.

Gotcha. Most of the time the Mac Client's performance is impacted by an unstable connection to the servers. To ensure this isn't happening to you, I recommend working through our [Mac Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) as a first step towards troubleshooting this.

Let me know if you continue to experience long loading times after working through those steps.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ARjuA434,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-09T15:47:51.260+0000)

> 
> Let me know if you continue to experience long loading times after working through those steps.

Thank you Targons Blade :) 
It helped ! 
I used the port forwarding and also changed to windowed mode in in-game setting. Its working a lot better now ! Now it takes apporx 45- 50 secs to load which is a lot better :D 
I appreciate the reply and for the support :) 
Feels like gifting you a skin but no rp :P hehe
